text: The 1908 Geneva Covenanters football team represented the Geneva College during the 1908 college football season. The head coach was Arthur McKean coaching the team in his second year. The team finished the season with a final record of 0–6–2. ==Schedule== ==References== Geneva Category:Geneva Golden Tornadoes football seasons Category:College football winless seasons Geneva Covenanters football
title: 1908 Geneva Covenanters football team
